about_the_game:
The Masquerade is a murder party game from 2 to 8 players where you're simultaneously a target and a hunter. Impersonate NPCs to hide from your hunter, while gathering enough clues to unmask and eliminate your target.



Get the maximum amount of coins before the end of the round. You earn coins each time you eliminate your target, kill your hunter, or deliver the fabulous egg.

  • Blend in with NPCs to avoid being suspicious
  • Explore the manor to find a variety of deadly weapons. Poison, crossbow, dynamit, dagger... the choice is yours!
  • Identify your target amongst the crowd of NPCs
  • Exploit alternative strategies to earn coins. Every strategy is a good one!
  • Uncover the many secrets and hidden rooms of the manor.

Demo content

  • Play the standard gamemode on the manor map without limits
  • Customize your games: Experiment with various scoring options and other parameters.
  • Open up your own private server and play with a group of friends, or join public servers.

What will the final game have compared to the demo?

  • Additional game modes (including team-based game modes)
  • Additional maps, each with their own set of tasks & quirks.
  • Cosmetics unlockable with in-game coins, earned at the end of each round.
  • Quickmatch functionality
  • Localization in multiple langages.
